languages.text: "Не вини себя. Это наверняка масштабный заговор. Дело не только в твоем отсеке".

traits.locale_text: "Не вини себя — Немезит организовал масштабный заговор. Так что дело не только в твоем отсеке".

languages.text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."
languages.original_text: "Не вини себя. Это наверняка масштабный заговор. Дело не только в твоем отсеке".

traits.locale_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This is likely a conspiracy on a much larger scale. This concerns more than just your compartment."
"Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This is likely a conspiracy on a much larger scale. This concerns more than just your compartment."
"Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."
"Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."
"Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."
"Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."
"Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas l'unique responsable. Cette conspiration ne se limite pas à votre compartiment, ses ramifications sont bien plus vastes. »
languages.original_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas l'unique responsable. Cette conspiration ne se limite pas à votre compartiment, ses ramifications sont bien plus vastes. »

languages.text: «No se considere único responsable. Seguramente esta conspiración opere a una escala mucho mayor. No solo ocurre en su compartimento, afecta a más regiones».
languages.original_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."

traits.locale_text: «No se considere único responsable. Seguramente esta conspiración opere a una escala mucho mayor. No solo ocurre en su compartimento, afecta a más regiones».

languages.text: 「自分だけを責めてはならない。この陰謀はおそらく、はるかに大きな規模で動いている。お前の区画以外にも影響を及ぼしている」
languages.original_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."

traits.locale_text: 「自分だけを責めてはならない。この陰謀はおそらく、はるかに大きな規模で動いている。お前の区画以外にも影響を及ぼしている」

languages.text: “不要把责任全都归咎到你自己身上。这很可能仅仅是某个大阴谋的一部分，影响的也不仅仅只有你负责的这片甲板。”
languages.original_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."

traits.locale_text: “不要把责任全都归咎到你自己身上。这很可能仅仅是某个大阴谋的一部分，影响的也不仅仅只有你负责的这片甲板。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht allein verantwortlich. Diese Verschwörung ist vermutlich weit größer angelegt. Sie betrifft nicht nur Euer Modul."
languages.original_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht allein verantwortlich. Diese Verschwörung ist vermutlich weit größer angelegt. Sie betrifft nicht nur Euer Modul."

languages.text: "Yalnızca kendini sorumlu tutma. Bu komplo, faaliyetini muhtemelen çok daha büyük bir ölçekte sürdürüyor. Senin kompartımanından çok daha fazlasını etkiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Do not hold yourself solely responsible. This conspiracy is likely operating on a much larger scale. It is affecting more than just your compartment."
